c74object.name: vftom~
c74object.description:
vftom~ provides a CPU efficient version of ftom~ using SIMD operations.
Use vftom~ to convert frequency to MIDI note numbers at signal rate.

method.name: signal
method.digest: Convert frequency to MIDI note number
method.description: Outputs the MIDI note number (from 0 to 127) corresponding to the input frequency

entry.name: signal
entry.description: The MIDI note number that corresponds to the input frequency is output as a signal. When an input frequency falls between two pitches, the fractional part of the MIDI value is included.
